name: Hostil
description: Hostil is a short emotional interactive tale about a young astronaut who has crashed on a extremely dangerous planet. No one will come to rescue him and his only hope is to move forward.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32 bits Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Standard DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
